Hello to our players and friends! 
This is the official Hypixel account for mcbbs.net! 
We wanted to finally come on here and say thank you for your good wishes and support. We are eager to hear that Minecraft officially comes to China soon. We are excited to see what Netease will do for the community!
For a long time we have known that sometimes players from Hong Kong and 'Other places' play on Hypixel, sometimes we accidently ban them for 'compromised account' because it can look like many people are connecting from the same IP address. we are sorry for that. We try to avoid doing it now. I hope you noticed some improvement.
We recently launched some translation project that we are hoping will help chinese speakers such as those people who live in Hong Kong understand how to play on our network. We also made contact with the admins of mcbbs, who will let us know if there is anything we should know about that can help. They are very nice guys!
Thank you for support and love, and a special thank you to those people who have been helping others to play our Minecraft minigames even though we have been in English only
Final note, China forums definately has the best emoticons!{:10_530:} {:10_509:}
